properties.entry: update measurement_values set name=:name ,short_name=:shortName where id=:id
delete from measurement_values where id in (:valueIds)

select mv.*, mu.id as unit_id, mu.name as unit_name, mu.short_name as unit_short_name, mu.function, mu.base, mu.unit_order as order from measurement_values as mv,measurement_units as mu where mv.id=mu.value_id and mv.id=:id
